1.title: Pilot, Pt 1

episode of.title: The League of Ordinary Gamers (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: When three roommates find a giant TV abandoned in their alley, they decide to take it. But after a long night of gaming they realize that this TV may be more than it appears.

2.title: Pilot, Pt 2

episode of.title: The League of Ordinary Gamers (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: Waking up after a long night of gaming, the roommates soon begin to notice strange things happening all around them. As they huddle up to discuss these new developments, they start to piece together what happened.

3.title: The Morning After

episode of.title: The League of Ordinary Gamers (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: Colin and Annalise try to master their powers with varying levels of success, while Martin simply embraces his. Meanwhile, a visit from Chuck, their landlord, risks exposing both Martin's secret and Anna's crush.

4.title: Interventions

episode of.title: The League of Ordinary Gamers (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: When Colin has a World of Warcraft relapse, it's up to Annalise and Martin to stage an intervention. Meanwhile, the secret of the TV is out, and someone is on to our heroes...

5.title: Pre-Martina Syndrome

episode of.title: The League of Ordinary Gamers (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot: As Martin gets caught up in the unfortunate side-effects of transforming into Martina, Colin and Annalise are forced to take desperate measures to ensure their survival.

6.title: On Love and TARDIS-es

episode of.title: The League of Ordinary Gamers (TV Series 2012– )

6.plot: When Annalise lets her inner fan-girl loose during a new episode of Doctor Who, she ends up incurring Martin's wrath and possibly mortifying herself in front of her secret crush, Chuck the hot landlord.

7.title: Well This Is Awkward

episode of.title: The League of Ordinary Gamers (TV Series 2012– )

7.plot: While Annalise is away at work Chuck accidentally meets Martina, setting in motion a series of events that culminate in a harrowing encounter. Meanwhile, Colin has been acting strangely...

8.title: Norm

episode of.title: The League of Ordinary Gamers (TV Series 2012– )

8.plot: Colin, Annalise and Martin interrogate Norm, the new arrival who was impersonating Colin, and learn about the origin of the TV that gave them their powers. Meanwhile, Chuck is tortured for information by the Shadowy Agents.

9.title: Bossfight

episode of.title: The League of Ordinary Gamers (TV Series 2012– )

9.plot: The roommates receive a surprise visit from the Shadowy Agent, forcing them to take action.

imdb.plot outline: Three roommates get sucked into a world of espionage and danger when they steal a TV that secretly contains a device for granting superpowers. Colin ends up with the ability to control electronics, Annalise with the ability to control other people's bodies, and Martin with the ability to transform into the beautiful Martina. But will the allure of the supernatural, and the dangers of the people tracking down the stolen device, be enough to convince them to get up off the couch? The first live-action webseries from Edgeworks Entertainment, The League of Ordinary Gamers was the vanguard of the return of Edgeworks after a three-year hiatus from filmmaking. Beginning with a nine-episode first season, League premiered on February 9th, 2012.
imdb.title: The League of Ordinary Gamers
